channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8.4 Advanced Mission Critical Update Support
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8.4 Advanced Mission Critical Update Support

item.title: CVE-2024-4467|2024-07-08T17:39:02.821Z -- red%20hat -- red%20hat%20enterprise%20linux%208.4%20advanced%20mission%20critical%20update%20support
item.description: A flaw was found in the QEMU disk image utility (qemu-img) 'info' command. A specially crafted image file containing a `json:{}` value describing block devices in QMP could cause the qemu-img process on the host to consume large amounts of memory or CPU time, leading to denial of service or read/write to an existing external file.
